QuestData.Title: Captured Critters
QuestData.Description: This poor critter is about to be podling food. It would be pretty easy to set this little guy free.
QuestData.LogDescription: Free Captured Critters in Gloomshade Grove.
QuestData.RewardText: The podlings are vicious creatures. The critters of this forest would surely have gone extinct if you didn't intervene.
